titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the month of October 2010 as National Principals Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Ms. Hirono moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1652.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 11/16/2010--Passed House amended. Recognizes school principals' and assistant principals' contribution to the success of elementary and secondary school students. Supports the designation of National Principals Month.
